dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1972
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reaffirms their refusal to become a "corporation" in the face of a huge Internal Revenue Service tax penalty. Points to Peter Maurin's insistence on personal responsibility and turns to scripture and the Eucharist for solace and faith. (Also see document #523)
